text: Alexander Urbom (born December 20, 1990) is a Swedish professional ice hockey defenceman who is currently playing for EC Red Bull Salzburg of the ICE Hockey League (ICEHL). He has also played for New Jersey Devils and Washington Capitals in the National Hockey League (NHL), with Djurgårdens IF and Skellefteå AIK in the Elitserien/Swedish Hockey League (SEL/SHL), Severstal Cherepovets of the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL), and Düsseldorfer EG of the Deutsche Eishockey Liga (DEL). He was drafted by the New Jersey Devils in the third round, 73rd overall, in the 2009 NHL Draft. ==Career statistics== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 2007–08 Djurgårdens IF J20 Superelit 39 3 8 11 54 7 0 1 1 2 2008–09 Djurgårdens IF SEL 28 0 0 0 2 — — — — — 2008–09 Djurgårdens IF J20 Superelit 16 5 6 11 45 — — — — — 2009–10 Brandon Wheat Kings WHL 66 12 21 33 87 15 4 3 7 17 ==References== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Albany Devils players Category:Brandon Wheat Kings players Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:Swedish Hockey League players Category:Swedish ice hockey defencemen Category:Washington Capitals players Category:Ice hockey defencemen
